ygData.subject: Rune Sword
ygData.msgSnippet: Last night I was playing a new character, and at level 2 had banded armor and a Rune Sword.  (Wish I could have started my first character that way). To make a
ygData.messageBody:
Last night I was playing a new character, and at level 2 had banded armor and a Rune Sword. (Wish I could have started my first character that way). To make a long story short, I was killed, and when I was brought back, my Rune Sword was gone. In it's place, was my beginners short sword, that I had previously destroyed. My question is: Is the Rune Sword a Lore item? I had a Wisp Stone in my inventory, which is a Lore item. I realize that it would disappear in the event that I logged off. But in this case, I had died. Upon resurrection, you can imagine my dismay to find my Rune Sword gone, and the beginners sword back in my inventory. Was this a glitch? Should I petition a GM? Any help would be greatly appreciated.

Thanks,
Leri
